Fresh new UI and UX with display language navigation and content language/s customization. Experience HD quality video and adaptive bitrate streaming with subtitles, offline download, watch later and add to favourite features. Smart content search including voice search. Enjoy live TV with channel programming guide.

We've made subscribing to ZEE5 quick and easy so that you can sit back and enjoy our most viewed Original Show 'Karenjit Kaur - The Untold Story of Sunny Leone' and new Hindi and Regional Movie Premieres every week!
Our new 'Search' allows you to type in your language and discover more, so do try that too!

Our upgraded video play makes your entire streaming experience smoother and seamless so that all you do is chill and enjoy your favorites!

We've made subscribing to ZEE5 quick and easy so that you can sit back and enjoy our most viewed Original Show 'Karenjit Kaur - The Untold Story of Sunny Leone' and new Hindi and Regional Movie Premieres every week!
Our new 'Search' allows you to type in your language and discover more, so do try that too!

Our upgraded video play makes your entire streaming experience smoother and seamless so that all you do is chill and enjoy your favorites!

Good is now even better! We've made sure you will love watching our new Original Show 'Karenjit Kaur - The Untold Story of Sunny Leone' and new exclusive movie premieres every week. Our pages and images load faster and episodes start off in a blink.
Subscribing is also quick and easy so all you do is relax and watch your favourites. Our smart search now allows you to type in your language and that's definitely worth a try!

ZEE5 is now available globally! Feel at home wherever you are with ZEE5, the largest destination for Indian content.
Over 1,00,000 hours of entertainment across 12 languages. Your favourite TV Shows, Bollywood and regional language movies, Live TV, Exclusive digital premieres, Originals and more.
Subscribing is quick and easy so all you do is relax and watch your favourite content.

We know you love your TV Shows! And that’s why ZEE5 exclusively brings to you your favourite Tamil and Telugu shows before TV telecast! Enjoy this festive season with World Digital Premieres, ZEE5 Original Shows and our refreshed library of Hindi and Regional movies.

We know you love your TV Shows! And that’s why ZEE5 exclusively brings to you your favourite Tamil and Telugu shows before TV telecast! Enjoy this festive season with World Digital Premieres, ZEE5 Original Shows and our refreshed library of Hindi and Regional movies.
ZEE5 premium shows and movies are now just a click away, sit back and enjoy an ad free experience!
ZEE5 premium shows and movies are now just a click away, sit back and enjoy an ad free experience!

Fellow Earthlings – Here’s a newer & shinier version of the ZEE5 App. We’ve made some tweaks to make Sunny Leone (Karenjit Kaur) a tad hotter, Ranveer Singh (Simmba) a wee bit more ferocious & Sonam Kapoor (Veere De Wedding) sassier. We’ve done a few more engineering things which are pretty cool - we could talk about it for hours but we won’t bore you. But yeah, it will make your drive smoother.
So download/upgrade to the latest version and press ‘Play’ for the best entertainment in the world!

This monsoon season, don't let the rains wash out your entertainment time! Plan marathon binge sessions anytime, anywhere with the new, improved ZEE5 app. But getting better never stops and that's why we wish to connect with you more. Our new FAQ and Contact Us pages allow for easy, quick solutions to your problems or feedback. So, go on and download the new ZEE5 app NOW!
A new improved experience of ZEE5, just for you!

We know how important it’s to have a smooth and easy user experience. This version brings to you a complete revamped ZEE5 app to give you an enhanced experience through

- Easy signup & login
- Quick browsing and navigation
- One-click switch between content and features
- Superior player experience
- Smart downloads & watch offline
- Personalised content recommendation
